thread.section_title: Merchant One Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Merchant One | merchantone.com
thread.title: Randi K Miller
thread.title_full: Merchant One reviewed by Randi K Miller

author: Randi K Miller
title: Randi K Miller
text: I've been having problems with my credit card machine ever since I switched to chip processing. I was getting messages that said my charges were not being reconciled or I wasn't getting printouts at the end of every day from the machine. I've called several times To try to get this problem cleared up. I finally spoke with someone yesterday who seemed to know what he was doing. Hopefully he fix the problem and charges that were being made on a regular basis will finally get processed on a daily basis. I'm keeping my fingers crossed.
